verses.translation: 1. Marka arlada la gilgilo gilgilashadeeda daran (Qiyaamada).
2. Oo arladu soo bixiso culeysyadeeda (wixii ku aasnaa),

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
verses.translation: 6. Maalintaas dadku wuxuu u soo dareeri rac rac si loo tusiyo (jazaha)acmaashooda.

verses.arabic_text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: 7. Ee qofkii fala samaan le’eg saxar wuu arki,

verses.arabic_text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: 8. Qofkii falana xumaan le’eg saxar wuu arki.
